rules.name: Audit Period Mentioned
rules.description: Verify that the audit period (from and to dates) is clearly stated in the report

rules.name: Client Entity Name Mentioned
rules.description: Verify that the client entity/company name is mentioned in the report

rules.name: Management Responsibility
rules.description: Verify that management's responsibility for internal controls is stated

rules.name: Scope of Work Defined
rules.description: Verify that the scope of the engagement/audit is clearly defined

rules.name: Testing Procedures Documented
rules.description: Verify that testing procedures and methodologies are documented

rules.name: Control Exceptions Noted
rules.description: Verify that any exceptions or deviations in controls are documented

rules.name: Auditor Sign-Off
rules.description: Verify that the report is signed or acknowledged by the auditor

rules.name: Conclusion Provided
rules.description: Verify that a conclusion or opinion regarding controls is provided
